TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpSimpleClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol
Public MustInherit Class HttpSimpleClientProtocol Inherits HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: 表示用于使用简单的 HTTP-GET 和 HTTP-POST 协议绑定与 XML Web services 进行通信的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for communicating with an XML Web service using the simple HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST protocols bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类指定大部分实现通过 HTTP 使用编码器来编码参数和返回值为常见 MIME 格式与 XML Web 服务进行通信。This class specifies most of the implementation for communicating with an XML Web service over HTTP using encoders to encode the parameters and return values into common MIME formats. 派生自这些编码器类。These encoders derive from the class. 默认情况下，代理类派生自编码在纯 XML 中使用的应用程序/x-www 的窗体的 urlencoded MIME 类型和响应参数。By default, a proxy class deriving from encodes parameters using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME type and the response in plain XML. 可以使用指定自定义的 mime 格式化程序属性，但是，没有将其集成到服务说明和代理生成支持。Custom mime formatters can be specified using the attribute, however, there is no support for integrating this into a service description and proxy generation. `Notes to Inheritors:` 当重写此类时，可以引入派生类中的特定于特定类型的 XML Web 服务方法。`Notes to Inheritors:` When you override this class, you can introduce methods in the derived class that are specific to a particular type of an XML Web service. 方法只需捕获参数，并调用基类来完成与站点进行通信的工作。The methods simply capture the parameters, and call the base class to do the work of communicating with the site. 如果引入的方法是异步的调用和方法。If the introduced methods are asynchronous, call the and methods. 如果引入的方法是同步的调用方法。If the introduced methods are synchronous, call the method. 重写构造函数通常设置属性设置为 XML Web 服务方法的 URI。The overridden constructor typically sets the property to the URI of the XML Web service method. Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的派生的类为给定的服务说明。The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) generates derived classes of for a given Service Description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 wsdl.exe 为生成的代理类`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service below. 代理类派生自，又派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建上述的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

span.span: The name of the XML Web service method.

param.span: 创建 时要使用的 URL。

param.name: parameters
param.span: 一个对象数组，包含要传递到 XML Web services 方法的参数。

span.span: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the XML Web service method.

param.span: 数组中值的顺序与派生类的调用方法中的参数顺序对应。

span.span: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

param.name: callback
param.span: 异步方法调用完成时要调用的委托。

span.span: The delegate to call when the asynchronous method call is complete.

param.span: 如果 callback 为 ，则不调用委托。

span.span: If callback is , the delegate is not called.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: 客户端提供的其他信息。

span.span: The additional information supplied by a client.

summary.span: 开始异步调用 XML Web services 的方法。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous invocation of a method of an XML Web service.

returns.span: 一个 ，它可以传递到 方法以从 XML Web services 方法中获取返回值。

span.span: An that can be passed to the method to obtain the return values from the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `methodName`参数用于查找的参数类型和正在调用的方法的返回值方法。The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the method. 它还用于查找添加到该方法的自定义属性。It is also used to find custom attributes that may have been added to the method. ，和的派生方法所需的 HTTP 协议提供其他信息。, , and provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the HTTP protocol. `asyncState` 传递到`callback`，并且包含在从返回方法。`asyncState` is passed into `callback` and is included in the that is returned from the method. 它可用于将信息传递到中的异步结果的处理异步调用的上下文从`callback`。It is useful for passing information from the context of the asynchronous call to the handling of the asynchronous result in `callback`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是名为 XML Web 服务调用一个 ASP.NET Web 窗体`Math`。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 内`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体开始和完成的异步调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form starts and completes an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类为`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 内`BeginAdd`代理类方法方法开始异步调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `BeginAdd` method of the proxy class, the method starts an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建上述的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.

exception.span: 请求到达了服务器计算机，但未被成功处理。

span.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例是名为 XML Web 服务调用一个 ASP.NET Web 窗体`Math`。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 内`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体开始和完成的异步调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form starts and completes an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类为`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 内`EndAdd`代理类方法方法开始异步调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `EndAdd` method of the proxy class, the method starts an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建更高版本的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created.

MemberSignature.Value: protected object Invoke (string methodName, string requestUrl, object[] parameters);

protected: System::Object ^ Invoke(System::String ^ methodName, System::String ^ requestUrl, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters);
member this.Invoke : string * string * obj[] -> obj

param.name: methodName
param.span: 正调用 方法的派生类中的 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The name of the XML Web service method in the derived class that is invoking the method.

param.name: requestUrl
param.span: 客户端正在请求的 XML Web services 方法的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the XML Web service method that the client is requesting.

param.name: parameters
param.span: 一个对象数组，包含要传递到远程 XML Web services 的参数。

span.span: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the remote XML Web service.

span.span: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

summary.span: 使用 HTTP 调用 XML Web services 方法。

span.span: Invokes an XML Web service method using HTTP.

returns.span: 包含派生类方法的返回值、所有引用或 参数的对象数组。

span.span: An array of objects containing the return value and any by-reference or parameters of the derived class method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `methodName`参数用于查找的参数类型和正在调用的方法的返回值方法。The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the method. 它还用于查找自定义属性添加到该方法。It is also used to find custom attributes which may have been added to the method. 和的派生方法所需的 SOAP 协议提供其他信息。 and provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the SOAP protocol. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是名为 XML Web 服务调用一个 ASP.NET Web 窗体`Math`。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 内`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体以同步方式调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form synchronously invokes the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-csharp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类为`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 内`Add`代理类方法方法以同步方式调用`Add`Web 服务方法。Within the `Add` method of the proxy class, the method synchronously invokes the `Add` Web Service method. [!code-cpp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建更高版本的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created.
